text: Raúl Ricardo Alfonsín (12 March 1927 – 31 March 2009) was an Argentine lawyer, politician and statesman. He served as the President of Argentina from December 10, 1983, to July 8, 1989. Alfonsín was the first democratically elected president of Argentina following the military government known as the National Reorganization Process. He was awarded the Prince of Asturias Award for International Cooperation in 1985, among numerous other such recognitions.Príncipe de Asturias: Raúl Alfonsín Alfonsín died from lung cancer in Buenos Aires, aged 82. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:People from Buenos Aires Province Category:Presidents of Argentina
title: Raúl Alfonsín
